SELECT s.USER_ID AS userId, s.score AS score, d.CODE AS code, d.CARD as card, s.STATUS as status, s.TEST_DATE AS testDate, U.REL_NAME AS relName FROM T_SES_EMS_EXAM_USER_SCORE s, T_SES_BMS_USER U, T_SES_EMS_EXAM_PAPER_USER D WHERE s.PAPER_ID = d.PAPER_ID AND s.USER_ID = U.ID AND d.USER_ID = U.ID AND s.IS_MAX = 1
AND U.REL_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{relName}), '%')
AND s.STATUS = #{status}
AND D.CODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{code}), '%')
ORDER BY testDate nulls last
